name: Retro Combat (itch)
description:
*NOTE* to play the web version, go to http://retrocombat.com/Shooter (check out my website at https://app.retrocombat.com). I may implement https support for this game so that the game can be played online in itch.

Ever wanted to relax, chill, and play around with some bots and friends? Well, Retro Combat gives you this opportunity through a simple first-person shooter. In this game, you'll be able to play with: 

- 5 different maps (more coming)
- 15+ different weapons (more coming)
- Online multiplayer (hosting over local wifi)
- Customizable number of bots you want to play with

The game will still be continuously updated, please comment/review if you discover any bugs or errors. If you have any content suggestions, please also comment and it may be implemented.

This Application is developed using Unity3d by a high school student.
